name: Korone Potris
description:
I made this little Hololive fangame based on a short video Korone showed at the end of one of her streams. In the video, she showed this game she had invented, to quickly get rid of the unpleasant feelings that happen when she cannot stream.

Do not confuse with a certain other game with falling blocks that also ends in "tris".

Developed in 2 days, so expect a bunch of funny bugs. :)

The blocks will stop falling while rotated horizontally. That's not a bug, it's intended as it happened like that in the original video.

Try the Windows version if you have trouble running the Web version!

Origin video (Starts at 4:59:00)

Or watch the clip I made of the game part:

https://youtube.com/clip/Ugz63YwXhvPD3-vBkxx4AaABCQ
